title: Weather Girl (Free Full Movie) | Comedy | On-Air Meltdown | Mark Harmon, Jane Lynch, Jon Cryer

sources.title: Weather Girl (Free Full Movie) | Comedy | On-Air Meltdown | Mark Harmon, Jane Lynch, Jon Cryer
sources.description:
A Seattle morning weather anchor melts down live on-air. Closing in on forty, she is now unemployed, lacks career prospects, and must cope with her cheating boyfriend.  Weather Girl is a slice of life comedy about reckoning the difference between growing old and growing up.

Directed by Blayne Weaver
2009
Starring:
Tricia O' Kelley (New Adventures of Old Christine)
Mark Harmon (NCIS)
Kaitlin Olson (It's Always Sunny..., The Mick)
Marin Hinkle (Marvelous Mrs. Maisel, Once and Again, Two and a Half Men)
Blair Underwood (LA Law)
Patrick J. Adams (Suits)
Jane Lynch (Glee)
Jon Cryer (Two and a Half Men)
David Giuntoli (Grimm, A Million Little Things)
Enrico Colantoni (Veronica Mars, Just Shoot Me)
Brett Butler

#markharmon #joncryer #janelynch #indiecomedy #seattle
